title: 17(1)(a) of the Motor Insurance Insolvency Compensation Act 2024 (No. 32 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as 

the Motor Insurance Insolvency 

Compensation Act 2024 (Section 17(1)(a)) Order 2025.

title: 17(1)(a) of the Motor Insurance Insolvency Compensation Act 2024 (No. 32 of
heading: 2. The amount of €170,000 is specified for the purposes of section 17 of the
text_raw:
2. The amount of €170,000 is specified for the purposes of section 17 of the 

Motor Insurance Insolvency Compensation Act 2024 (No. 32 of 2024). 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the 
Minister for Finance, 
15 January, 2025. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st January, 2025.
